channel.title: Dextrocity -Where Creativity Begins
channel.description:
Well ive been seeing that now a days its actually quite rare to find a 474 server without any 317 loading 602 animations or 634 items so i decided hey why not start a project on a 317 loading 474 items and 482 animations so our goal is to bring back some good old school pking and creativity to a server, i plan to make several quests on this server and make it a quite interesting economy server although we may have some old school content :)
[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/6379/rslogo3.png[/img]
[B]Current Developers[/B] Skyrix (inactive) Dextrell
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [B]Combat[/B] Perfect weapon speeds [color=green]Correct weapon animations[/COLOR] [color=green]A perfect max hit formula[/COLOR] [color=green]Special attack[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [B]Magic[/B] [color=green]All modern combat spells[/COLOR] [color=green]All ancient combat spells[/COLOR] [color=green]Alching, Enchanting[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [B]Range[/B] All bows range able [color=green]Throwing weapons[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [B]Prayer[/B] Not started
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QusJe.gif[/img] [B]Mining[/B] [color=red]Not started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [B]Fishing[/B] [COLOR="Yellow"]All fish can be caught[/COLOR] [color=green]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [color=green]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [B]Cooking[/B] [color=green]All fish can be cooked[/COLOR] [COLOR="Yellow"]All meats can be cooked[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [B]Wood Cutting[/B] [color=green]All Trees Cut able[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [B]FireMaking[/B] [color=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [B]Agility[/B] [color=green]Gnome Agility Course[/COLOR] [color=green]Force movement mask[/COLOR] [color=green]Correct animations used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [B]Herblore[/B] [color=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [B]Thieving[/B] [color=green]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [B]Crafting[/B] [color=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [B]RuneCrafting[/B] [color=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img] [B]Fletching[/B] [color=red]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img] [B]Farming[/B] [COLOR="Red"]Not Started[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [B]Minigames[/B] [COLOR="Lime"]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]Pest Control[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR="Yellow"]Barrows[/COLOR] [color=red]Mage Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR="Yellow"]Fight Caves[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [COLOR="Lime"]Horror From The Deep[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]Recipe For Disaster[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]Desert Treasure[/COLOR]
Update Log [code] Dextrells Update Log
1/29/2012
1) i have currently worked on our logo
2) started working on the website
3) update 3 i have currently worked on the hovers for our website and fixed a few problems
1/30/12
4) Made a list of all the 474 revision quests 100%
5) revamped the quest interface
6) added an agility system with perfect emotes
7) fixed some combat bugs
2/2/12
8) added a sailing system with the ships taking you to the locations
9) added full fight pits with headicons
10) npcs announces the name of the fight pits winner
11) remade the thieving base with attacking npcs when stealing stalls
2/5/12
12) re-made the event system with better conventions
13) made a random event handler
14) added freaky forester random event
15) added a river troll random event
16) added a spirit tree random event
17) added a zombie random event
18) added evil chicken random event
2/13/12
19)added full sheep shearing with correct emotes and fixed bugs
Skyrixx's Update Log
1/29/2012
1) Fixed Minor Clan Chat bugs, Client would DC when you toggled Lootshare.
2) Added Horror From the deep
3) added full pest control with a npc vs npc system
4) added recipe for disaster quest
5) Added Desert Treasure
2/2/2012
6) remade the dialogue system [/code]
Media Media [IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/3862/loginrc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/8466/stalls.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/9324/duelarena1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6621/sailingz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/4634/pestcontrol.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/1118/spoils.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/9333/advertname.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/1292/dagg1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4950/dagg2i.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/8965/dagg3.png[/img]
Client Developer Application Format [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join? Can you dump map data? [/code]
Server Developer [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join? [/code]
Website Developer (Html) [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Do you know css? Do you know livescripting? Do you know Php? Why do you want to join? [/code]
Forum Manager [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join? [/code]
Forums Developer [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Do you know css? Do you know Php? Why do you want to join? [/code]
Website Plugins Administrator [code] Name: Age: Skype: Experience: Position: Do you know css? Do you know javascript? Do you know Php? Why do you want to join? [/code]
if you are accepted we will talk through skype i hope you have a microphone :) Note: Dextrocity will not have Spirit shields torva curse prayers and no 602 animations it will not have dspk combat and the current base im using is a blank project insanity me and skyrrix added the current content

item.title: Dextrocity -Where Creativity Begins
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Dextrell, post:5, topic:432916”][quote author=CoderChris link=topic=535624.msg3916303#msg3916303 date=1329236934]
to many PI and DSPK… also every one uses this kind of banner
[/quote]

you mean too many dspk i mean look at the top list all are dspk yes this is pi but if you didn’t look at the media you see a big improvement compared to other PI’s our goal is to knock out these horrible DSPK’s out there[/quote]
This looks just like impact 2.0 (no offense)

item.title: Dextrocity -Where Creativity Begins
item.dc:creator: @Dextrell Dextrell
item.description:
@Dextrell wrote:

Its a project based off project insanity which is pretty advance to be honest
This is an old school server althoug its not a remake im aiming to make this server unique loaded with quests and adding many unlockables and perks to veteran players im planning to add a quite large amount of quests givin those who complete them access to secret dungeons and discovering new
Methods of training and making money i hope by the time this project is finished we will top those horrible
Glitched dspk servers well i want to also open opportunities for those who enjoyed 474 based servers to actually find a 474 not those pi/dspk saying theyre a 474 when they have 602+ data with the exception of the maps

Read full topic
